full_summary:
### Details of the Solicitation

**Tender Reference Number**: WS3625205557-Doc3795973925  
**Submission Deadline**: February 3, 2023, 14:00:00 (Eastern Standard Time)  
**Tender Title (English)**: Workbenches and Cabinets  
**Tender Title (French)**: Bancs de travail et armoires  
**Procurement Category**: Goods and Services (GD)  
**Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding  
**Solicitation Method**: Request for Proposal (RFP)  
**Closing Date and Time**: The submission deadline is February 3, 2023, at 14:00:00 (Eastern Standard Time).  

**Background and Objective**: The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is issuing a solicitation for workbenches and storage cabinets to be used in the Sheet Metal Fabrication Work Center and Combat Systems Electronic Work Center at Fleet Maintenance Facility (FMF) Cape Breton. The purpose of this solicitation is to procure goods that meet the minimum requirements of the Government of Canada.

**Scope of Work**: The requirements for the goods to be procured are specified in the solicitation document. The goods must meet the minimum requirements outlined in the document, which includes specifications for workbenches and storage cabinets, as well as storage cabinets and shelving. 

**Trade Agreements**: This solicitation may be subject to the provisions of various trade agreements, including the Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement, and others. Please refer to the solicitation document for further information.

**Contact Information**: For inquiries related to this solicitation, please contact Angela Nakade at angela.nakade@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

**Notice Document**: The solicitation document is available for download at the following URL: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14953410?extsite=MTQ5NTM0MTBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==. 

Note the following important details:

* The submission deadline is February 3, 2023, at 14:00:00 (Eastern Standard Time).
* The solicitation is subject to various trade agreements.
* The solicitation document is available for download at the specified URL. 
* The contact information for inquiries related to this solicitation is Angela Nakade at angela.nakade@tpsgc-pwgsc
